snippet: The Florida Supreme Court ordered a new hearing for Shimeek D. Gridine, who was 14 when he wounded a man with a shotgun during an attempted robbery.
abstract: Florida Supreme Court orders new sentencing hearing for Shimeek D Gridine, who was 14 when he receive 70 years in prison without parole for attempted murder during a robbery in 2009; says sentence violates limits on juvenile penalties set by United States Supreme Court.
lead_paragraph: The Florida Supreme Court ordered a new hearing for Shimeek D. Gridine, who was 14 when he wounded a man with a shotgun during an attempted robbery.

headline.main: Florida Justices Reject 70-Year Sentence for Juvenile, Likening It to Life Term
headline.print_headline: Florida Justices Reject 70-Year Sentence for Juvenile, Likening It to Life Term
